overview:
Carrie Pryor is Managing Partner of Greenwich Harbor Partners and has over 20 years of senior executive search experience, Carrie has recruited Board Directors, CEOs and their direct reports, as well as partners of private equity firms. She also serves as an advisory board member for Constellation Ventures.

Carrie has been a Senior Client Partner at Korn/Ferry International, CT Partners, and Spencer Stuart in Media & Entertainment and Global Technology practices. Previous to search, Carrie held senior positions with ROLM Corporation, Pacific Telesis and Kidder Peabody-Corporate Finance.

Carrie brings a seasoned presence in media and entertainment and private equity along with a pioneering spirit having working in the internet space since the early 90’s. Carrie’s experience acts as a bridge between technology and telecom clients and media and entertainment clients. She is an outstanding search consultant, a client advocate and a highly regarded member of the global community of media, entertainment and technology executives.

Global Industry and Functional Expertise: •Media •Entertainment •eCommerce
•Telecom and Technology •Business Services •Convergent Industries •Board Members •C-Suite Officers: •Chief Executive •General Managers •Marketing & Sales •Technology & Digital
